name: Novartis Comprehensive Leprosy Care Association
briefDescription: Novartis Comprehensive Leprosy Care Association (NCLCA) was set up in 1989 provides comprehensive service and care to leprosy patients. The Novartis CLCA health care package includes free MDT, inserts providing health education to patients physiotherapy exercises and providing prefabricated hand and foot splints to help in correcting disabilities, providing grip-aids to enable people with advanced hand deformities, empowering patients to deal with ulcers with self-care kit and following it up with special footwear.  Economic rehabilitation enhances self-esteem and social well being.  More than 25000 patients have benefited directly and about 100,000 patients indirectly. The Association has been the proud recipient of many awards.
